title: Bug 124066: 'Insert Chart' not translated into Chinese in context menu
description: Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
EB: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the layout page.
2. Right-click anywhere in the layout.
3. Observe that the context menu appears with the option 'Insert Chart' not translated into Chinese.
